description: Detects a suspicious curl process start on Windows with set useragent options
false_positives: Scripts created by developers and admins
name: Suspicious Curl Change User Agents
query: ((process.executable:*\\curl.exe OR Product:"The\ curl\ executable") AND process.command_line:(*\ \-A\ * OR *\ \-\-user\-agent\ *))
author: frack113
